Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>, it's you? You're full of
energy again this morning I see. Let's
both work hard again today!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>, it's you?
<PAGE>
Please, don't talk to me in the morning.
I don't like getting out of bed, not at
all. Save it for the afternoon!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What now, <MYNAME>? I was up late last
night, so could you please just leave
me be?
<PAGE>
What? You want to know what I'm doing?
As if that makes any difference to you.
It's nothing important, anyway.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, working on your farm again today?
I know you love your job, but still, I'm
impressed. Just a little.
<PAGE>
Hmmm, but your hair is a mess! I know
working on the farm is important, but
take care of your hair too, okay?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey. I'm feeling pretty good today. I
even feel like talking to you a little!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey. You look strange, possibly, 
tired? Why not take a break from work
every now and then?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>, you look worn out. I think
you need a change of pace! Why not try
breaking up your routine a little?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, please. I'm enjoying a little
private time at the moment. Don't
interrupt me.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You finished all your work
yet? You'll probably have to wake up
early tomorrow, so get to bed soon.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What? I want nothing to do with you.
Please find someone else to entertain
you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Coming to see me first
thing in the morning? You've got the
right idea!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hah hah, you look so happy! I do like
an honest woman.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You look busy again today.
Just don't work too hard, okay!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Unless of course you are hoping to
collapse and have me look after you?
You'd find me kinder than you expect!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it, <MYNAME>? You need to try a
little harder if you want to get my
attention.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What's up, <MYNAME>? Looks like you really
wanted to see me. How cute.
<PAGE>
Such cuteness deserves a reward. I'll
permit you to stay by my side for a
while. Just be a good girl, okay?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey there, my princess. Your smile looks
as cute as ever today. I can't take my
eyes off of you!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it, <MYNAME>? You need to try a
little harder if you want to get my
attention.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good evening, my princess. Tonight is
for just me and you. I'll give you a
night you'll never forget.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. If you are going to be out
walking at night, you'd better not go
alone. You could always ask me.
<PAGE>
If I feel like it, I might walk you back
to your house. You never know!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Please, don't talk to me. If you want
to talk to me, you need to get my
permission first.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, my princess. You looked so
cute when you were sleeping! I watched
you for most of the night.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, my princess. Do you have
a good morning kiss for your beloved
husband?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hah hah, I'm joking. Glad to see you in
high spirits again today.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You dare take me for granted? ME? This
isn't working out anymore.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, my princess. You haven't said
anything to me all day. Is something
the matter?
<PAGE>
Or have I done something to upset you?
Come on, out with it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What's wrong, my princess? You've been
pining to talk with me, have you? How
cute you are.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You dare take me for granted? ME? This
isn't working out anymore.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What's got you working so hard that you
don't talk to me until this late in the
day, princess?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>There's no need to be so tight lipped.
If you are busy, you can tell me. I'll
help to sort you out.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it, <MYNAME>? The night is long.
Shall we spend a little more of it
together before bed?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, great weather we're having today.
Too much UV is bad for your hair,
though! Watch out for that!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, your hair is damaged. It's this
rain. Watch out for that.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You're suffering in
just this much heat?
<PAGE>
I thought you were made of tougher stuff
than that! Take a lesson from me, why
don't you?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
The rain feels good in summer, but I
can't stand getting water on me. My
clothes must be pristine at all times!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. What a great season this
is. Perfect for reading.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What depressing rain. Days like this
make me feel pretty bad. Boy...

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You have to watch out for
static during winter. It's a great way
to damage your hair.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You look like a dog 
running through the snow! Hah, what a 
way I have with words.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>. Coming to see me on a
day like today? That's dedication.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>. I'm impressed that
you came to see me on a day like today.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Don't go outside today.
That's an order from me, so obey it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Don't go outside today.
That's an order from me, so obey it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, I heard you've started dating?
Congrats, I guess.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Just don't do anything to get yourself
dumped! You've got my support.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A lot of shampoos and hair dyes are made
using plants. This forest looks like a
good place to stock up.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I often played in a forest like this
when I was a kid. Boy, that takes me
back...

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
There's meant to be a good fishing spot
around here, but... I'm not good at
just staying still. Not in my nature.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The scenery here is really romantic. The
perfect spot for a date. Hey, I'm a guy!
I do think about these things.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I quite like being up high. Looking down
on the town feels fantastic.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I often see animals around here. I'm
not that bothered about wild animals,
but it might be nice to have a pet.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Doesn't matter what it is, farming or
whatever, if you don't give it your all
then you won't enjoy it.
<PAGE>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You work hard, okay? Do
well and maybe I'll praise you a little.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Watch it, <MYNAME>. You were just thinking
that farming doesn't suit me, weren't
you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Don't underestimate me. A man as great
as me can succeed at whatever he does,
okay?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT>
Ore, huh... I prefer jewels, to be
honest, but there's something to be said
for raw potential, too.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT>
A mine is a mysterious place, don't you
think? The search for mining the big
prize...
<PAGE>
Although all I want to dig up is
something to give to a beautiful woman.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm looking for a chance to further hone
my skills as a stylist... but the town
needs more people before I can do that.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The town is finally starting to pick up
a little, eh? I bet people will keep on
coming in now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm looking forward to all the new hair
they will bring with them! Heh heh!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've started to see a real increase in
the number of people coming to my salon.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm glad to finally get to make the most
of my skills.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It seems like a dream, that there were
once so few people here in town.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Look how full of life this place has now
become... I'm happy about it, too.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't think you can stop taking care
of yourself just because you run a farm,
okay? Fashion comes first at all times!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like to collect things like
accessories, clothes and hats. I've got
some mean accessorizing skills.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you want to change your hairstyle
come to my salon. I'll give you a full
beautification.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't get along well with others,
really, so I prefer to be left alone.
<PAGE>
I'm so smart, though, that as I was
growing up people my own age were
always coming to me for stuff. Hah!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm a man who makes the impossible,
possible. If you're going to something,
aim to be the best. Right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>I can't understand these people who just
say "I can't do it!" without even really
trying.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I have a mother and a sister. Neither of
them are especially delicate. That's
made me a master of housework.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I had a father as well, if that's what
you call it. I don't think of a man who
was never at home as my father.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're pretty interesting, <MYNAME>. I
know we'll be friends for the rest of
our lives, and I'm grateful for it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I can't stand the sight of you. Don't
talk to me.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Do you even have any idea how I feel at
the moment? I guess I can't read women
very well after all...

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm dating you. You should be grateful
for that. I know you'll never leave me.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That reminds me, some of the people
coming to the salon recently have been
teasing me about you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
You look happy about that? Because
you're imagining me being teased? You
know what I do to people who tease me?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Before too long, <MYNAME>, every 
aspect of you will be dictated by me. 
I hope you are grateful!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Huh? What about me? What're you talking
about? I'm not going to change. Try it,
then, if you think you can do it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I like women who are kind, honest, cute
and motivated.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hey, and I know you aren't dumb! I'm
talking about you, <MYNAME>. I'm praising
you. Be happy!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do you think, <MYNAME>. You must be
happy that you're dating me!
<PAGE>
What? What about me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I don't have to tell you that, do I? I
feel exactly the same as you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You've completely disappointed me,
<MYNAME>. I thought you were suited to me,
but look at us. Disgusting.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You seem to like making me angry,
<MYNAME>. I didn't expect you to turn out
so petty. So crass. So small.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Tell me that you love me.
Look into my eyes and tell me. Mean it.
Can you?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I never felt like this when I was
single, but now I always want to get
home as soon as I finish work!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Thinking of you waiting for me here at
home just makes me walk faster.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Listen. I'll be perfect at my work and
perfect at housework. So you don't have
to achieve that, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I only need one thing from you, <MYNAME>.
To support me with all of your strength.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
People recently keep telling me that
they are jealous of how happy I look.
Are they kidding?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>I don't "look" happy, I AM happy. You
know what I mean, <MYNAME>, right?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Listen up, <MYNAME>. I want you laughing
at my side everyday from now on.
<PAGE>
I'll never get tired of seeing you
smile, that's why. Not until the day I
die.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Listen. Everything that belongs to you
is mine, <MYNAME>. And everything that
belongs to me is also mine.
<PAGE>
What's wrong? You can't accept that?
Before too long that's the only way
you'll want it! You'll see, baby.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No need to worry about anything,
<MYNAME>. I'm an adult.
<PAGE>
Just because we once dated, I'm not
going to treat you any differently,
okay? So no need to walk on eggshells.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So it took splitting up for you to see
just how wonderful I am, eh? You should
have seen that from the beginning!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You can't stop smiling, can you! Are you
that happy to get married? What a cute
little thing you are!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This means that you are truly mine,
<MYNAME>. You must be happy! Be grateful!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Do you think you can fool
me? If everything gets too much for you
say something, okay? Take a break.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Our child, <MYNAME>. Surely he or she is
going to be talented and beautiful! I
can't wait to meet them.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our baby will be born soon. I know it is
going to be tough on you, but I'm here
with you!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> is so cute. My treasure. I can't
understand anyone who doesn't feel the
same way.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME> is so cute. What's wrong,
princess? You want some praise as well,
do you?
<PAGE>
Okay, okay, don't get worked up. You're
the cutest in the world, after all,
<MYNAME>. Cuter than anyone else!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME> is getting big. I can't wait to
see how our child will grow up.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a pretty strange feeling, seeing
the grown up <CHILD_NAME>. I still
think of <CHILD_NAME> as our tiny baby!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Genovese Pasta, huh? That's my absolute
favorite.
<PAGE>
Always has been. Thank you, <MYNAME>.
Bring it for me again tomorrow! Promise!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh. Quite a thoughtful gift.
<PAGE>
You get me, <MYNAME>. You've got great
sensibilities. Allow me to praise you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present perfectly suited to my tastes.
I like it. Received, with thanks.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hah hah, something for me? Received,
then, with thanks.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, hey, <MYNAME>. You don't know much
about me, do you? I don't like that.
Remember that for the future.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What's this? Are you mocking me? I hate
this! I won't accept it again!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
That stinks! Get it away from me! Are
you trying to make me mad? I hate this
above all other things. Ugh!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow. That's a big present. Very
thoughtful of you. You have my praise.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? You made this? Impressive. Of
course, any less than this wouldn't be a
suitable gift for me.
<PAGE>
You understand me well, <MYNAME>. I'll
take this, with my thanks.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't feel like that right now. If you
want me to take a gift then you need to
pick your moment more carefully.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't feel like that right now. If you
want me to take a gift then you need to
pick your moment more carefully.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't feel like that right now. If you
want me to take a gift then you need to
pick your moment more carefully.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, you've already given me something
today. I only take one present per day.
That's my rule.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, you already gave me something
today. You love me enough that you want
to shower me with gifts? How cute.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, you already gave me something
today. You're such a scatterbrain,
princess. How cute.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow! Genovese Pasta for my birthday
present? Well done.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Thank you, <MYNAME>. This is the best
birthday present I've received today.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <ITEMNAME0>? You really do want to
celebrate my birthday, don't you!
<PAGE>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. I'm looking forward to
next year already.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's my birthday we're talking about.
Makes sense you'd research what I like,
eh? So why didn't you?
<PAGE>
Oh, I'm still happy, <MYNAME>. Gratefully
received.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, this is my birthday we're talking
about! You might have tried to find out
the stuff that I like, eh?
<PAGE>
Okay, okay, I'll take it. Thank you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, it's my birthday today. And this is
what you choose to give me? Not very
smart, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Okay, okay, I'll take it. Be sure to do
better next year.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, it's my birthday today. And this is
what you choose to give me? What's going
on inside your head, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Okay, okay, I'll take it. Be sure to do
better next year.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, it's my birthday today. And this is
what you choose to give me? Who do you
think I am?
<PAGE>
Okay, okay, I'll take it. Be sure to do
better next year. Make sure of it!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow... that's a big one! Perfect for my
birthday, I guess.
<PAGE>
Thanks for your efforts, <MYNAME>. Much
appreciated.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow. Impressive. Getting a gift this
big, it really feels great!
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. Allow me to praise
you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A chick... Cute enough, I guess. But
not really my thing.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A bird... Cute enough, I guess. But
not really my thing.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's one big bird, sure, but a bird is
just a bird. Not really my thing.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I do love obedient animals. Honest and
cute. I love to pet them.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, hey, that dog is clearly
overweight. You thought about a pooch
diet? Still one cute critter, anyway.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I do love obedient animals. Honest and
easy to handle. I'll happily take care
of them.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, hey, that dog is clearly
overweight. You thought about a pooch
diet? Still one fine animal, anyway.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love cats. It's fun to take a proud
and selfish animal and become friends
with it, right?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, hey, that cat is clearly
overweigh. What a waste of a cute
little face.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love cats. It's fun to take a proud
and selfish animal and become friends
with it, right?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, hey, that cat is clearly
overweight. What a waste of a cute
little face.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sending flowers as a mark of your daily
feelings... a most admirable tradition.
I'll take these flowers, with gratitude.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Today's the Flower Festival?
Flowers are for men to give to women
they love, but I guess it's okay.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I guess this shows how grateful you are
to me, <MYNAME>? Of course you are.
Received, with my thanks.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been waiting for you, princess.
Today's the day you shower me with
words of gratitude, correct?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hah hah, this is great. Make sure you
show me your gratitude all day long,
okay?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey. I've been waiting for you. This
represents your feelings for me, right?
Then received, with my thanks.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been waiting for you, princess.
Waiting for your gift that shows how
passionately you feel about me.
<PAGE>
It looks like you've picked a good one.
I'll enjoy it later. You can expect a
nice payback for this, too.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been waiting for you, princess.
Waiting for your gift that shows your
overflowing love for me.
<PAGE>
As we're married, I guess we could share
this, but I think today I'm going to
have it all for myself. Thanks.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey, hey, are you kidding? Today is the
Pumpkin Festival. I don't need to be
treated like a kid.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>If you insist, though, okay. I'll take
them. Be grateful.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, we're dating! Can't you think of a
better gift for me than Pumpkin
Festival candy?
<PAGE>
Okay, <MYNAME>. If you insist, I'll take
them. Be grateful.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, I'm your husband. Can't you do
better than kiddy candies for me? Even
if it is the Pumpkin Festival.
<PAGE>
Okay, <MYNAME>. If you insist, I'll take
them. Be grateful.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want to marry me? Please, enough
jokes.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah, you want to marry me? How cute!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I don't think we are quite at that point
yet. Don't you agree? But if you can
make me a little bit happier, maybe.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hold it, <MYNAME>. Give the situation a
little more thought, why don't you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>A proposal needs to take place somewhere
more suited to a romantic mood. Come on,
follow me.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong? Got the pre-wedding
jitters? Don't worry. I'll make you
happy.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
